meanings.definition: A boat used for transportation on rivers.
meanings.sent1: The riverboats carried passengers along the calm river.
meanings.sent2: The old riverboats were painted in bright colors.
meanings.sent3: The riverboats had a race to see which one was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The riverboats glided through the water like graceful swans.
meanings.sent5: Children waved excitedly as the riverboats passed by.

meanings.definition: A type of vessel designed for travel on inland waterways.
meanings.sent1: The riverboats were essential for transporting goods along the river.
meanings.sent2: Tourists enjoyed the scenic views from the deck of the riverboats.
meanings.sent3: The riverboats hosted a party with music and dancing on board.
meanings.sent4: The riverboats were like floating hotels with all the amenities.
meanings.sent5: The captain skillfully navigated the riverboats through narrow passages.
